entry.lex: Ab Klink was born in the Netherlands, belongs to the Christian Democratic Appeal party and graduated from Erasmus University in Rotterdam.
Born in the Netherlands, Ab Klink attended Erasmus University Rotterdam and belongs to the Christian Democratic Appeal party.
Born in Miri, Malaysia, and living in, Sarawak, Abdul Taib Mahmud, is a member of Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party.
Born in Miri, in Malaysia, Abdul Taib Mahmud, resides in Sarawak and is a member of the "Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak" party.
Abdul Taib Mahmud, a member of the Barisan Ra'ayat Jati Sarawak party, was born in Miri, Malaysia and lives in Sarawak.
Abdulsalami Abubakar, who served in the Nigerian Air Force, was succeeded by Olusegun Obasanjo, who was in office at the same time that Atiku Abubakar was Vice President.
Nigerian Air Force member Abdulsalami Abubakar was succeeded by Olusegun Obasanjo who was in office whilst Atiku Abubakar was Vice President.
Abdulsalami Abubakar served in the Nigerian Air Force. Olusegun Obasanjo succeeded him. When Mr. Obasanjo was in office, Atiku Abubakar was Vice-President.

originaltripleset.otriple: Abraham_A._Ribicoff | office | "United States Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare"

modifiedtripleset.mtriple: Abraham_A._Ribicoff | office | "United States Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare"

entry.lex: Abraham A. Ribicoff once worked for the United States Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare office and was married to Chicago-born Casey Ribicoff.
Casey Ribicoff, wife of Abraham A. Ribcoff, was born in Chicago. Mr. Ribcoff worked as the United States Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare office.
Casey Ribicoff was born in Chicago and was married to Abraham A Ribicoff who once worked for the United States Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare office.
Adonis Georgiadis was born in Athens (Greece), and worked as Minister for Health.
Adonis Georgiadis, born in Athens, Greece, worked as the Minister for Health.
Adonis Georgiadis, born Athens (Greece), held office as the Minister for Health.
Airey Neave, who was involved in the Battle of France, was awarded the Order of the British Empire and ended his career on 30th March 1979.
Airey Neave, who ended his career on 30 March 1979 participated in the Battle of France and was awarded the Order of the British Empire.
Airey Neave OBE, fought in the Battle of France and ended his career on 30th March 1979.
Imst, in the County of Tyrol, was the birthplace of Alfons Gorbach, who died in Graz.
Alfons Gorbach was born in Imst, County of Tyrol and died in Graz.
Alfons Gorbach was born in Imst in the state of Tyrol and he passed away in Graz.

originaltripleset.otriple: Alvah_Sabin | office | "Secretary of State of Vermont"

entry.lex: Alvah Sabin, who was born on 23rd October 1793, in Georgia, Vermont, worked as the secretary of the State of Vermont.
Alvah Sabin was born on 23 October 1793 in Georgia, Vermont and later worked as the Secretary of State of Vermont.
Alvah Sabin, secretary of the State of Vermont, was born on October 23, 1793 in Georgia, Vermont.
Abraham Lincoln was a commander in the American Civil War. Alfred Moore Scales fought in the Battle of Fredericksburg during the American Civil War.
Alfred Moore Scales fought in battles such as the Battle of Fredericksburg, part of the American Civil War military conflict, during which Abraham Lincoln was a commander.
Alfred Moore Scales fought in the Battle of Fredericksburg, part of the American Civil War in which Abraham Lincoln was a commander.
Robert E Lee was a commander in the American Civil War when the Battle of Cold Harbor took place. Aaron S Daggett fought in this battle.
Aaron S. Daggett battled in the Battle of Cold Harbour which took place during the American Civil War. Robert E. Lee was a commander in the American Civil War.
Aaron S. Daggett fought in the American Civil War, Battle of Cold Harbour. Robert E Lee was a Civil War commander.
